text: Goliszów is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Chojnów, within Legnica County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland. Prior to 1945 it was in Germany. It lies approximately north-east of Chojnów, north- west of Legnica, and west of the regional capital Wrocław. The village has a population of 770. ==References== Category:Villages in Legnica County
title: Goliszów
